name: Duel to Persuade
description: Change the duel system to persuasion. Change references in code. Change flavor text.

name: Expand Persuasion
description: More flavor text. Add types of persuasion you select in addition to power. Rock-paper-scissors for the types.

name: Real-time combat
description: Create a real-time combat, something like Hades 2 and Children of Morta. Something fast, fluid, bouncy.
